name: DrunkOnPotions
description:
Maze Chad had a little too much to drink and is probably hallucinating. We must help Chad by making him drink more potions and shoot explosions.  Careful,  some combinations of the potions may not be good, especially the red ones!  

(Please check the updated Key Bind)

KeyBind -

Left arrow/A key            Move left

Right arrow/D key       Move right

Space key                          Jump

MouseRight                    Toggle potion selection

MouseLeft                        Confirm potion selection

MousePosition               Aim 

(The Maze since being drunk looks like he can't hold the load  anymore and shoots in a fixed duration  !)
